code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import Banner from'./components/Banner';import Dashboard from'./components/Dashboard';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[bannerVisible,setBannerVisible]=useState(true);const[bannerText,setBannerText]=useState("");const[bannerLink,setBannerLink]=useState("");const[timeLeft,setTimeLeft]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/banner').then(response=>{const{text,link,timer,visible}=response.data;setBannerText(text);setBannerLink(link);setTimeLeft(timer);setBannerVisible(visible);}).catch(error=>console.log(error));},[]);useEffect(()=>{if(timeLeft>0){const countdown=setInterval(()=>{setTimeLeft(timeLeft-1);},1000);return()=>clearInterval(countdown);}else{setBannerVisible(false);}},[timeLeft]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col",children:bannerVisible&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Banner,{text:bannerText,link:bannerLink,timeLeft:timeLeft})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{})})})]});}export default App;
